description: A gothic mansion on Thriller Bark where Dr. Hogback conducts his zombie experiments. Contains multiple rooms including laboratories, living quarters, and trap-filled hallways designed to capture intruders.

keyEvents.title: General Zombies Ambush
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Robin, and Franky are lured into a trap room where they face an army of General Zombies.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion's trap system successfully separates and captures members of the Straw Hat crew.

keyEvents.title: Jigoro Appears in the Mansion
keyEvents.description: Jigoro makes his debut in the mansion's trap room, joining the General Zombies against the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion serves as the stage for revealing Moria's most powerful zombie soldiers.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Captured and Transported
keyEvents.description: Luffy is trapped in a coffin and carried via pulley system through the mansion to another location.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the mansion's complex internal transport system designed for moving captured victims.

keyEvents.title: Tararan Blocks the Path
keyEvents.description: Tararan appears in the mansion hallway, blocking Robin and Franky's escape route.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion's labyrinthine design allows zombies to easily trap and corner intruders.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational as Hogback's base and zombie laboratory

description: The world's largest pirate ship, so massive it resembles an island. Ruled by Warlord Gecko Moria, it serves as both his base of operations and a massive graveyard where he creates his zombie army. The ship features a gothic aesthetic with mansions, graveyards, forests, and bridges.

keyEvents.title: Perona Arrives at the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Perona arrives at the Straw Hats' ship while they are trapped in the mansion, intending to raid it for treasure.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' vulnerability with their ship unguarded on Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as Gecko Moria's mobile base and zombie production facility

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company. A brigantine-sloop with advanced features including the Soldier Dock System and powered by Cola energy. Currently docked at Thriller Bark.

keyEvents.title: Perona Raids the Sunny
keyEvents.description: With the Straw Hats trapped in the mansion, Perona boards the Thousand Sunny to search for treasure and valuables.
keyEvents.significance: The unguarded ship becomes vulnerable to Thriller Bark Pirates' exploitation.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Straw Hat Pirates' vessel
